channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report E-2024100693
item.description:
Report E-2024100693

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-31T09:22:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-23
  • City: BEAVER
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Durning transport, a pinhole formed in the side of the drum caused by a nail. Driver noticed leak during a pre-trip inspection and called for assistance through our emergency operations center. Field services teams were dispatched, and the spill was cleaned up.
